title: What is a UART in an FPGA? Basics of Serial Ports, COM Port, RS-232, RS-485

media:group.media:title: What is a UART in an FPGA? Basics of Serial Ports, COM Port, RS-232, RS-485
media:group.media:description:
Learn the basics of UARTs for use in FPGA. Introduction to baud rates, parity, full vs. half duplex, etc. All important concepts for how you can get your UART in your FPGA up and running. Tutorial for beginners.

Support me on Patreon!
https://www.patreon.com/nandland

Want to build your own UART on an FPGA? Grab a Go Board today! https://www.nandland.com/goboard/introduction.html
